mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id AS postId, p.author_id AS authorId, p.title AS title, p.category AS category, p.content AS content, p.image_url AS imageUrl, p.video_url AS videoUrl, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt, p.view_count AS viewCount, COUNT(l.user_id) AS likeCount FROM posts p LEFT JOIN likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id WHERE p.category = '${category}' GROUP BY p.post_id, p.author_id, p.title, p.category, p.content, p.image_url, p.video_url, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.view_count ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
